thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1683
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I have used this site several times over the last few years to find the lowest possible price on flights to and from ontario to help my father who is battling cancer. I have never had an issue with them, nor have I had any second thoughts on whether or not that was the lowest price. This time, I had to book a return flight with less than a weeks notice, and thanks to flight hub I managed to book a flight that worked with my crazy time schedule (did I mention I have 4 kids? Lol) and on a lower budget. Because of this, I am able to be there with him when he needs me and not break the bank in the process. Thank you flight hub!
